TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Used in photodynamic therapy, a drug that is absorbed by tumor cells; when exposed to light, it becomes active and kills the cancer cells.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "éter de dihematoporfirina"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento usado en la terapia fotodinámica que es absorbida por las células tumorales. Cuando se expone a la luz, se activa y destruye las células cancerosas.
